subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: The Air Force has enlisted the former top marathoners Alberto Salazar and Dick Beardsley to pump up the crowd. The Army is enticing runners with personalized postcards bearing action photos of themselves.
snippet: The Air Force has enlisted the former top marathoners Alberto Salazar and Dick Beardsley to pump up the crowd. The Army is enticing runners with personalized postcards bearing action photos of themselves.
